On Jan 4, 2005, at 1:24 AM, leperjuice wrote:
>
> I was wondering if anyone is aware of a good howto for properly 
> integrating JUnit into
> Apple's XCode? I can manually run tests, but I've had no luck 
> modifying the generated Ant
> build files to cleanly incorporate JUnit testing into my workflow. I'd 
> appreciate any pointers
> anyone can recommend!


I use XCode for Objective-C and Cocoa, but not for Java, so I can't 
offer any specific advice.

You might try searching the XCode users mailing list:

    http://www.archivum.info/xcode-users@.../
